Detailed Description

template<typename COMOBJECTTYPE>
struct ComObjectWrap< COMOBJECTTYPE >

COM object wrapper class template used for safe access, automatic resource release and memory accounting.

template<typename COMOBJECTTYPE>
void ComObjectWrap< COMOBJECTTYPE >::addAlloc ( std::string const &  desc  )  [inline]

This sets the allocator (resource counter) for this COM object and adds the size of the object to the appropriate pool.

Parameters:
desc The resource counter that the COM object should be using.

template<typename COMOBJECTTYPE>
void ComObjectWrap< COMOBJECTTYPE >::addRef (  )  [inline, protected]

This increases the reference count of the COM object by one.

template<typename COMOBJECTTYPE>
void ComObjectWrap< COMOBJECTTYPE >::copy ( ComObjectWrap< COMOBJECTTYPE > const &  other,
bool  bAddRef = true 
) [inline, protected]

This protected function releases the current COM object if there is one and assigns this object to another.

It is used by the copy constructor and assignment operators.

Parameters:
other The ComObjectWrap to copy.
bAddRef Boolean indicating whether to add a reference count on copy. Default is true.
